OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive cytarabine IV continuously 72 hour day 1-3 , mitoxantrone IV 30-60 minute day 4 , bevacizumab IV 90 minute day 8 absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve partial complete remission may receive second course therapy begin approximately 30 day completion first course . Patients follow death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 12-45 patient accrue study within 1-3 year .
